definition: Indole-3-acetaldehyde oxime + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Glutathione + Oxygen <=> S-[(E)-N-Hydroxy(indol-3-yl)acetimidoyl]-L-glutathione + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
name: (E)-indol-3-ylacetaldoxime,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase],glutathione:oxygen oxidoreductase (oxime-hydroxylating)
